title: HERBY CRUSTED CHICKEN
directions: Pre-heat the oven to 170° C /160° C fan/ Gas mark 4.
Blend the KNORR® Flavour Pot, breadcrumbs and cheese together to form a rough crumble.

Place the chicken breasts on a greased baking tray, pile the herb crumble evenly over the breasts. Place tomatoes on the tray and drizzle with oil and bake for 25-30 minutes , or until cooked through.
Serve with the roasted tomatoes , and potato wedges.
